name: Cat Ba Rustic Homestay
address: Thôn 1 Xã Xuân Đám Huyện Cát Hải - Hải Phòng, Đảo Cát Bà, Việt Nam
description:
Cat Ba Rustic Homestay có hồ bơi ngoài trời theo mùa, khu vườn, phòng chờ chung và sân hiên ở Đảo Cát Bà. Với quầy bar, chỗ nghỉ nằm cách Bãi biển Xuân Đám 1 phút đi bộ. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, bếp chung và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Tất cả các phòng đi kèm điều hòa, tủ lạnh, lò nướng, ấm đun nước, vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh, đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí và tủ quần áo. Ngoài phòng tắm riêng với vòi sen và máy sấy tóc, một số phòng tại khách sạn cũng có view núi. Tại Cat Ba Rustic Homestay, các phòng đều có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Chỗ nghỉ có phục vụ bữa sáng mỗi buổi sáng, gồm các lựa chọn thực đơn buffet, kiểu lục địa và kiểu Á. Tại chỗ nghỉ, khách sẽ tìm thấy nhà hàng phục vụ ẩm thực Việt và đồ nướng. Bên cạnh đó, họ có thể yêu cầu món chay và món thuần chay.

Cat Ba Rustic Homestay cách Ben Beo Harbour 9 km và Cannon Fort 9 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Cát Bi, cách khách sạn 43 km.

review.comment_positive: Linh is amazing. She always asks what your plan is for the day and likes to chat. She is very helpful! The rooms were super nice and comfortable.

review.room_type: Phòng có giường cỡ King nhìn ra cảnh núi non
review.comment_positive: Sạch sẽ,thân thiện

review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Nghỉ Tập Thể 8 Giường Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ
review.comment_positive: Thân thiện , sạch sẽ

The host was wonderful, very nice and attentive. They have everything you need there- food, laundry, drinks/water. The pool was nice too. We enjoyed the location as well, short bus to the city- a restaurant/bar across the street with a pool table. I think it’s great value for the money you spend.
review.comment_negative: A/C unit wasn’t working so it made for a pretty hot/sticky night

review.comment_positive:
Ling, the proprietor, is awesome. Arranged a 2d/1n tour that exceeded expectations, busses out of town, and a scooter rental.
Bungalows are small-ish but comfortable. Very clean.
This place is a bit out of town and nice and quite - I really enjoyed it. Only a 15 minute scooter ride to the busyness of Cat Ba town. They have good scooters for rent.
Ling is also an excellent cook

Linh made the entire stay very comfortable. The room was clean, the breakfast was delicious and Linh and her family were extremely helpful. She rented motor bikes to us and we were able to explore the city!  The location is ~15 min motorbike from cat ba city but there is lots to do near the accommodation. Linh also helped us find an earlier bus when we needed to depart earlier and most companies were sold out!

Our stay at the Rustic Homestay was great, the owners are very lovely people, very friendly and helpful! They have rented us the scooters, we have ate tasty breakfast and lunches there and enjoyed out time. Definately recommend! Its a quiet nice place :)

review.rating: A little hidden gem on Cat Ba Island
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
What a gem of a find it's a little way out of the Cat Ba centre (3.5k) so you can hire a scooter from the property if you want to get around.
I was made to feel welcome from the very early (7.30am) check in to the moment I left.
Beautiful Family and dog (2 adorable children)
Clean and comfortable rooms
Great food and cold beer.
Swimming pool.
Laundry
Onwards travel tickets
So glad I found this place, you will not be disappointed.
10 out of 10 from me
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Fun, happy and convenient to explore island
review.comment_positive:
Super friendly host 
Scooters to hire, convenient as this place is out of town
Tours available
Home cooked food and Binh's bar/restaurant opposite was great, fire pit and all 
Gorgeous dog 
Able to explore the island from here 
Extended by a day with no worries
review.comment_negative:
WiFi wasn't reliable
We cleaned the shower head so it had more flowing streams 
Out of town which some may not like
Kids around which some may not like
